title: ISic020048. ISic020048
body:
Facsimile Images

((*))
((*))

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Symbol of a five-pointed star. This sign is widespread throughout the ancient world and used in Attic ceramics sometimes as a mark, sometimes as an apotropaic symbol or as decoration. On the ceramics from Segesta it could have a purely decorative value (see Agostiniani 1977, p.17).

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 48 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Ambrosini 1970 471 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002187
  • Tusa 1970 no.44 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002567
